events.message: We have received the applicant's resume for the software engineer position and their portfolio link has been reviewed.
The application has been categorized under Engineering based on keywords like software and developer in the candidate's profile.
A recruiter with experience in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's application process.
The initial screening call was completed successfully, where the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of software development.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity to join the engineering team.
We have scheduled the technical interview with the senior developer for the upcoming Monday at 10 AM.
